name: Coogee Beach House
description:
Located smack bang on Coogee Beach! Spend your days soaking up the sun, snorkelling in Gordon Bay & doing coastal walks. We also have the world-famous Coogee Pavilion on our block where you can enjoy a drink on the rooftop bar over looking the ocean & The Coogee Bay Hotel a 3 minute walk away.  Coogee Beach House has everything you need right at your door step for a true Australian Beach experience. In the hostel we have a pretty chilled out atmosphere so you can hang in the large communal room with cable TV, free library, games and with the  free Wi-Fi your Instagram posts will make your friends at home in the office green with envy. 

Check out our dorms, 90% are King Single size and the Deluxe dorms have full privacy curtains. We have also got the full range private room options from singles to triples as well. Sheets are included, and you can hire towels if you don't have one in your pack or they are free in private rooms. Rooms are kept airy by fans, and there are lockers for your gear. We have got laundry facilities & a back balcony for BBQ Area. 

Coogee Beach is without doubt one of Sydney finest beach suburbs. located only 7 kilometres South East of Sydney's City Centre (CBD). The International & Domestic Airports are around 20 minutes drive. Coogee also has everything you need from Yoga studios, cafes, bars, supermarkets ( our kitchen is open 24hours for your use), Thai massage centre next door, Banks, post office and a cinema nearby. 

Please note that any group booking in dorms room, we cannot guarantee that you will have the same room based on availability during the period you've requested.

Coogee Beach House Terms & Conditions:

The guest can cancel free of charge until 5 days before arrival.
The guest will be charged the total price of the reservation if they cancel in the 5 days before arrival.
We required prepayment prior your check in date.

The guest will be charged the total price of the reservation if they cancel anytime for non-refundable bookings.

- Check in from 12:00 pm to 22:00 pm
- Check out by 10:00am
- Payment upon arrival by credit cards, debit cards. (This property may pre-authorize your card before arrival)
- Taxes included

**Christmas and New Year - Between 22 Dec and 4 Jan. During this special period, bookings maybe charged in full upon confirmation and are not refundable or transferable. **

-Reception is open limited times during these unprecedented times.
- Age restrictions are 18 years old.
- Dormitory accommodations are available for guest ages 18- 40. However, we warmly welcome guests ages 40 and above to book one of our private rooms for a comfortable stay.
- For Late Check Ins: Please ring the doorbell on arrival. Your key shall be in an envelope with your name on it and room number on the desk when you walk into the lobby of the hostel on the right side. If you have any problems the night manager phone number is on the front door.

Reception is open limited times during these unprecedented times. If you arrive and reception is unattended, please come in front door on arrival. Your Name and room number shall be in an envelope on the desk in the lobby. Pleas ring the door bell if the front door is locked.

If you have any issues you can call the phone number on the front door.

Between 8am & 8pm please call us. 

After hours please call the night managers phone number on the front door.

* Getting here

If you wish to go by public transport, anywhere in Sydney, please use this website;

https://transportnsw.info/trip#/ 

If coming from the airport a taxi is around $40, Uber 30$ ask the driver to go via Gardeners Rd.

We wish you a very pleasant stay while in Sydney. If there is anything we can help you with or suggestions for the hotel please do not hesitate to contact us.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
